page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: {CHEADLESHIRE LIMITED. Cheadleshire Limited make clocks and mirrors.The owner of the company showed us round.First we went to some barns,they were used for storage,they were also used for silvering and screen printing.We were shown how to do silvering.First you have to clean the glass with a special powder.Then put stannous chloride on the glass which is then put on a wooden frame, and it is sprayed over with silver nitrate,caustic soda and ammonia. Clocks can be printed on glass, perspex,ceramic tiles,paper and metal. A man made the frames and cut the glass.Then the finished clocks were laminated. {MILLPLEDGE LIMITED. Millpledge Limited have a storage depot on the small industrial estate in Clarborough,although the Head
